q: - Microsoft Chief Executive Officer Steve Ballmer , said to unveil new software for tablets at the Consumer Electronics Show next week, will face skeptics who say his company won't soon narrow Apple's iPad lead. By the time Microsoft gets it figured out everybody will already own an iPad, said Keith Goddard , CEO of Capital Advisors Google Inc. an investing firm in Tulsa, Oklahoma, that holds Apple shares.`` That train has left the station.'' Rep. Mike Pence ( R-IN) said he was nearing a decision on his political future, the Indianapolis Star reports. A run for Indiana governor is also a possibility. Said Mike Pence : We've been trying to listen first to Hoosiers and then to other voices around the country about where they think we might best serve in the years ahead.
